description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Blue Poetry Book. Edited by Andrew Lang. With numerous illustrations by H. J. Ford and Lancelot Speed. L.P", "Single Works" Author: Lang, Andrew Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11603.h.11." Page: 40 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1891 Publisher: Longmans & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002068404 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
